thread.title: Sam Mitchell gave Tyus Jones hilarious advice on defending Russell Westbrook
thread.title_full: Sam Mitchell gave Tyus Jones hilarious advice on defending Russell Westbrook

title: Sam Mitchell gave Tyus Jones hilarious advice on defending Russell Westbrook
text:
Sam Mitchell gave Tyus Jones hilarious advice on defending Russell Westbrook FOX Sports 
Oct 8, 2015 at 7:02p ET + 
Sam Mitchell likely left Tyus Jones on Russell Westbrook island to learn from in-game experience. Jesse D. Garrabrant/NBAE via Getty Images FOX Sports   7:23p ET 
Minnesota Timberwolves coach Sam Mitchell clearly believes in teaching through experience. 

This is the guy, of course, who let Kobe Bryant drop 81 points on his team, refusing to switch defensive coverages despite his team's apparent inability to stop Bryant. true Tyus Jones starts against Russell Westbrook in his first game tonight. Sam Mitchell asked if he gave any tips to the rookie: "He has ESPN." â€” Anthony Slater (@anthonyVslater) October 7, 2015 

So when going over the Timberwolves' game plan with rookie Tyus Jones , Mitchell had some simple advice on how to stop Oklahoma City Thunder point guard Russell Westbrook . 

Welp. That didn't work. 

Westbrook finished with 14 points (5-for-10 shooting), eight rebounds and 13 assists in 22 minutes. Jones, meanwhile, had zero points (0-for-5 shooting), one rebound and four assists. More importantly, the Thunder won 122-99.
